text: The Minister for Employment () is a Danish minister office. The office was introduced with the Scavenius Cabinet on 9 November 1942. ==List of ministers== Source: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan=2| ! rowspan=2| Portrait ! rowspan=2| Name (Born-Died) ! colspan=3| Term ! rowspan=2| Political Party ! rowspan=2| Government |- !
